Why Masonry Capital?
Masonry Capital Management, LLC is a value-oriented investment management company that invests across the capital structure with a focus on quality businesses and special situations.
We think like business owners and our pragmatic approach to value investing brings this long-term perspective to each investment. Our catalyst-driven, long-biased strategy combines a concentrated portfolio of high-quality businesses with a collection of special situations that exhibit highly favorable risk/reward characteristics.
We manage a private investment partnership for long-term investors as well as a more liquid version of our strategy through separately managed accounts on a limited basis.









					Core Values
				









							Partnership
						
We think of our investors as partners and are committed to building long-term relationships.








						Integrity
						

							We put our investor’s interest ahead of our own by remaining disciplined in our process and approach. 
						








						Alignment
					

						We invest alongside our partners, when they do well, we do well. 
					








						Independence
					

						We do our own homework and believe there is no substitute for hard work and sound judgment.
